name: Enticing School!
description:
In Enticing School, you'll have adventures with different school girls with problems. A girl's attitude is determined by her personality, mental state, and physical condition. By spending more time with them, you'll gain a deeper understanding of them and their potential future relationships. The VN is bite-sized, which makes it easy to work on and easy to digest.

Currently, you have a girl for these mental and personality issues: 

Anxiety
Depression
Paranoia
Insomnia
Bipolar
Egocentrism

My hope is that some of them will resonate with you and you will enjoy the journey as much as I do.
